long_description: The URBANEARS Plattan Headphones start with classic headphone design, then take it above and beyond the ordinary with rich sound, full-size comfort and fold-down mobility. 47 in. fabric cord is durable and tangle-resistant; 3.5mm stereo plug is compatible with all standard 3.5mm music players and phones. Zoundplug jack on the earcap allows a friend to plug in and enjoy your music with you. The URBANEARS Plattan Headphones come with a microphone and remote that are compatible with unprotected 3.5mm standard devices such as iPhone(R) and Android.
short_description: The URBANEARS Plattan Headphones start with classic headphone design, then take it above and beyond the ordinary with rich sound, full-size comfort and fold-down mobility.
